[[File:Bag_Grass_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Grass Egg]] A '''Grass Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Grass-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | Bulbasaur || | Chickorita || Treecko || Turtwig || Snivy || Chespin |- | Oddish || | Hoppip || Roselia || Carnivine || Pansage || |- | Bellsprout || | Sunkern || Tropius || Budew || || |- | Tangela || | || || || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Lavender Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Azalea City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Verdanturf Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Eterna City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Nimbasa City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Courmarine City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
